mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(user_id, category_id, count) VALUES(#{userId},#{categoryId},#{count})
mapper.select: SELECT ct.id, ct.user_id, ct.category_id, ct.count, c.name as categoryName, c.price as categoryPrice FROM cart ct JOIN category c ON ct.category_id = c.id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
